name: MathTalk Fractions
overview: Professor Matt A. Matics of MATHTALK fame is back again! This time he's ready to help you master Fractions, Decimals and Percents. You enter your own problems to check your homework. The professor has also cooked up some exciting games that challenge you to solve all types of problems, particularly those that show the inter-relationship between Fractions, Decimals and Percents. Get ready for new confidence in math class as you check your work in the Problem Factory, meet the Team Challenge, out-wager the professor in Fraction Shuffle and get the highest score in the Fun House.
